name: mris_multiscale_stats
description: Compute the autocorrelation function of a curvature file using multiscale statistical techniques.

inputs.description: A spherical surface file suitable for computing geodesics.

inputs.description: List of subjects from one class.

inputs.description: List of subjects from another class.
